name: Christof Seiler
content: Christof Seiler · © 2025. All rights reserved. Christof Seiler Research | Software | Teaching | ORCID I am an assistant professor of statistics in the Department of Advanced Computing Sciences at Maastricht University, and a principal investigator at the Reliable AI Lab in the Center of Experimental Rheumatology at University Hospital Zurich and University of Zurich. I received my academic training at Stanford University, Inria, and University of Bern. We are currently building the RAI Platform that will help researchers in biomedicine to quantify uncertainty for their prediction models.
